name: Youtube Blue Theme
description:
-Abandoned, don't expect updates anymore-

A Blue theme for Youtube, highly recommended to use together with 'Lights Out - A Dark Youtube Theme' by Draxx7: https://userstyles.org/styles/92164/youtube-lights-out-a-dark-youtube-theme

I used TokHaar's youtube player style for the youtube html5 player style, many thanks to him:
YouTube - Custom colors video progress bar, by TokHaar https://userstyles.org/styles/95280/youtube-custom-colors-video-progress-bar
additional_info:
Known bugs:
 - None as which of I know, please report them to me however you like, pinkypiedude@gmail.com, @PindaPixel on Twitter, or if you can find me somewhere else

To do:
 - Style the test html5 player from https://www.youtube.com/testtube (Done)

Change log (DD-MM-YYYY)
05-08-2015:
 - Made the youtube logo in the new embedded html5 player blue

03-08-2015:
 - Added the new HTML5 player, if I forgot anything please report to me!

01-07-2015:
 - Redone everything
 - Removed dark theme, if you still want it install it separately. It might not be fully compatible, though

28-5-2015:
 - Added some blue stuff to the video player (not for the testtube one)

03-04-2015:
 - Updated the hitchhiker

11-03-2015:
Redone everything, so it's up to date again and stuff got fixed.

discussions.name: not totally blue with this config
